turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I'd like to order a coffee drink from a nearby Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what kind of coffee would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like a grande Americano with sugar.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you tell me if there is?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so your order is: a grande americano with sugar, correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Correct. Can I pick this up at the Starbucks in San Diego?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Is there one in Del Mar, San Diego?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: yes, there is one in 1435 Camino Del Mar.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. Could you place my order for that Starbucks one grande Americano?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your coffee will be ready for pickup soon at the starbucks at 1435 Camino Del Mar.
